issue.title: [CF 466] tracking soul swap dot target
issue.body:
Cybeloras edit: This isn't a defect report - no need to use the defect ticket template.

Hi, I just wanted to know if there's a way where I can track my dots on my soul swap target and if so how do I do it? Thanks And also with drain life can u make it show the ticks on the icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user poisonusivy | Imported from CurseForge issue #466 | Raw

comments.body:
Drain life ticks - no.

Tracking dots on your soul swap target - set them as your focus (Type '/focus') and set the buff'/debuff icon to watch the focus unit.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
